attributes.action: Remove Riley from representing Hadleigh on Suffolk County Council
attributes.additional_details: Hadleigh  Conservative candidates Dr Sian Dawson & Tina Campbell are calling for the resignation of transatlantic Councillor Riley, who should not be entitled to claim his allowance of £10,274 as an absent Suffolk County  Councillor, whilst residing full time 8,000 miles away in North Carolina, USA. This is an appalling waste of taxpayers money.
